remarks: Inverse partial isomorphism A of an intersection.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
diam.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
diam.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diam.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diainN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. ran I /\ Y e. ran I ) ) -> ( X i^i Y ) = ( I ` ( ( `' I ` X ) ./\ ( `' I ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
